comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I think the "double exposure" tag is wrong.  this is probably just a long exposure, and the fellow moved.

comment.author: 22411854@N04
comment._content: That was my initial thought too, but there's no trail of him moving, so he either stood there for quite a bit on a really long exposure and then ducked out really quickly, or it was a double exposure.
